sentences.english: A lot of moment, these coloring marble can deceive pass a barrier.
sentences.chinese: 很多时候，这些染色大理石都能蒙混过关。

sentences.english: He accused the minister of prevaricating.

sentences.english: He counterfeited the manager's signature to get by under false pretences.
sentences.chinese: 他伪造了经理的签名，企图蒙混过关。
